test_case.query_expression: SELECT * FROM (( SELECT P1.proposal_id AS pid1, P1.proposal_id AS pid2, P1.title AS t1, P1.title AS t2 FROM src1.proposals AS P1 JOIN src1.proposals AS P2 ON P1.proposal_id = P2.proposal_id AND P1.proposal_id = P2.proposal_id AND P1.title = P2.title AND P1.title = P2.title WHERE P1.proposal_id = 10 AND P1.proposal_id = 10 AND P1.title = 'A' AND P1.title = 'A' ORDER BY P1.proposal_id, P1.proposal_id, P1.title, P1.title ) UNION ( SELECT P1.proposal_id AS pid1, P1.proposal_id AS pid2, P1.title AS t1, P1.title AS t2 FROM src1.proposals AS P1 JOIN src1.proposals AS P2 ON P1.proposal_id = P2.proposal_id AND P1.proposal_id = P2.proposal_id AND P1.title = P2.title AND P1.title = P2.title WHERE P1.proposal_id = 10 AND P1.proposal_id = 10 AND P1.title = 'A' AND P1.title = 'A' ORDER BY P1.proposal_id, P1.proposal_id, P1.title, P1.title )) AS sub WHERE sub.pid1 = 10 AND sub.pid1 = sub.pid1
